home.welcomeMessage.title: CLIP IT AND SHIP IT!
home.welcomeMessage.description: The #1 app to watch, clip, and share your awesome gaming moments with your friends and the world! With our world-class tools, we make it incredibly easy to share your videos. Get started today!
home.section.name: Latest
login.modal.title: Your Account
login.modal.label: Login
login.email.label: Email
login.email.validation: You must enter a valid email.
login.password.label: Password
login.password.validation:
Password must be at least:
    - 8 characters.
    - least 1 uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter, and 1 number.
    - can contain special characters.
login.alert.default.text: Please wait! Your account is being created.
login.alert.success.text: Success! Your has been connected successfully.
